attributes.action: Stop Charity workers from hard selling charity donations to the general public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When walking along the street, hundreds of people every week are pressured into signing up to direct debit charity donations by a mulitude of charity organisations. The sole aim of these people is to pressure you into agreeing and should be recognised as a form of harassment. Charity organisations should be alowed to offer information, but not take the bank information on that occasion, allowing people to make an informed decision before making such an agreement.
